game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eridoria is plagued by an eternal twilight. The once-great kingdom of Silverleaf lies in ruin, and its people have lost hope.
game.ending: With the return of magic and the defeat of the Shadow King, Eridoria enters a new era of peace and prosperity. The land begins to heal, and the people of Silverleaf rebuild their kingdom.
game.synopsis: Players take on the role of a young apprentice mage who discovers they possess the ability to wield ancient magic. As they embark on a journey to uncover the secrets behind the loss of magic, they must navigate treacherous landscapes, battle fearsome enemies, and forge alliances with powerful allies to defeat the forces of darkness.
game.title: Rebirth of Magic
